text: Yuriy Kozyrenko (; born 27 November 1999) is a professional Ukrainian football striker who currently plays on loan for Hirnyk-Sport Horishni Plavni from FC Vorskla Poltava in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==Career== Kozyrenko is a product of Kolyps-Shturm Kostopil and Dynamo Kyiv Youth Sportive School Systems. In August 2018 he signed contract with Vorskla Poltava and he made his debut for FC Vorskla in a winning game against FC Kolos Kovalivka on 24 August 2019 in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==References == ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Vorskla Poltava players Category:FC Hirnyk-Sport Horishni Plavni players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:People from Rivne Oblast Category:Association football forwards
title: Yuriy Kozyrenko
